channel.title: Need Avatar
channel.description:
I'm in need of a Forum Avatar.
Needs:
- Be square shaped (Not sharp edged) - Be Blue and white - Text must be "Shane". - Unique and attractive please.
Thanks to whoever takes the time to make one for me!

item.title: Need Avatar
